SELECT tag.host_tag_id id, tag."name", COALESCE(r.COUNT,0) relNum FROM ops_host_tag tag LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tag_id, COUNT ( host_id ) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT rel.host_id, rel.tag_id FROM ops_host_tag_rel rel ) GROUP BY tag_id ) r ON tag.host_tag_id = r.tag_id
WHERE 1=1
AND tag.name like '%${name}%'
